title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement contato@curso-r.com. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Contributing to scry
text: outlines propose change scry. detailed info contributing , Curso-R packages, please see development contributing guide.

title: Contributing to scry
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ’ll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to scry
text: want make bigger change, ’s good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed).

title: Contributing to scry
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("curso-r/scry", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e. just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to scry
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: Contributing to scry
text: Please note scry project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

title: Getting help with scry
text: Thanks using scry! filing issue, places explore pieces put together make process smooth possible.

title: Getting help with scry
text: Start making minimal reproducible example using reprex package. haven’t heard used reprex , ’re treat! Seriously, reprex make R-question-asking endeavors easier (pretty insane ROI five ten minutes ’ll take learn ’s ). additional reprex pointers, check Get help! section tidyverse site.

title: Getting help with scry
text: Armed reprex, next step figure ask. ’s question: start community.rstudio.com, /StackOverflow. people answer questions. ’s bug: ’re right place, file issue. ’re sure: let community help figure ! problem bug feature request, can easily return report . opening new issue, sure search issues pull requests make sure bug hasn’t reported /already fixed development version. default, search pre-populated :issue :open. can edit qualifiers (e.g. :pr, :closed) needed. example, ’d simply remove :open search issues repo, open closed.

title: Colors and Costs
text: Whenever API presents set Magic colors, field array uses uppercase, single-character abbreviations colors. example, ["W","U"] represents something white blue. Colorless sources denoted empty array []. Common places might see kind array Card object’s colors color_identity. color field null missing, implies information pertinent current object. imply object colorless. Color arrays guaranteed particular order. list color representations provided :

title: Colors and Costs
text: Whenever API presents mana costs card symbols, using official plaintext notation symbol set forth Comprehensive Rules. example, “, ” written {2/W}, {T}. exhaustive list symbology provided . can also retrieve information programmatically using scry_symbology() method. Note symbols use UTF-8 characters outside ASCII range.

title: Frames
text: frame field tracks edition card frame used re/print question. overall Magic frame gone though several major revisions game’s lifetime.

title: Frames
text: frame_effects field tracks additional frame artwork applied particular frame. example, 2003 2015-frame cards Nyx-touched effect.

title: Card Imagery
text: card goes spoiler season data entry, may imagery period, low-quality imagery. can get computer-readable value image’s state using image_status field card objects. statuses :

title: Card Imagery
text: Card images Scryfall copyright Wizards Coast (/artist, old sets) provided purpose creating additional Magic software, creating community content (videos, set reviews, etc) Magic related products. using images Scryfall, please adhere following guidelines: cover, crop, clip copyright artist name card images. distort, skew, stretch card images. blur, sharpen, desaturate, color-shift card images. add watermarks, stamps, logos card images. place card images way implies someone Wizards Coast created card another game besides Magic: Gathering. particular, using art_crop: List artist name copyright elsewhere interface presenting art crop, use full card image elsewhere interface. Users able identify artist source image somehow. believe problem card image provided, please use “Report Card Issue” button bottom every card page.

title: Layouts and Faces
text: Magic cards can include multiple faces single piece card stock. Scryfall includes information card faces using card_faces property API objects. Please note following types multi-face cards Scryfall describe : Split cards (Comp. rules term): Split cards sorceries instant cards include two faces caster can choose face cast. back split card normal Magic back. Flip cards (Comp. rules term): Flip cards two parts permanent printed vertically one side card. play, ability card causes permanent flip (rotate 180°) side. back flip card normal Magic back. Double-faced cards (Comp. rules term): cards two faces different sides cardstock related . whole card single legal deckbuilding object. Double-faced cards can either transforming modal. Transforming double-faced cards (Comp. rules term): cards can either transform entering battlefield, can put onto battlefield already transformed. Scryfall use card_faces object describe two different transformed modes card, root object contain data applies sides. cards layout field set “transform”. Modal double-faced cards (Comp. rules term): Modal DFCs cast played either half card. Scryfall use card_faces object describe two different modes card, root object contain data applies sides (color_identity). cards layout field set “modal_dfc”. Reversible cards (casual term): term used Scryfall WotC describe piece cardstock two distinct Magic cards tokens printed opposite sides. two halves card related way treated two separate objects gameplay deckbuilding. overall Card object layout field set “reversible_card”, individual card_face objects layout fields describing distinct printings sides. Many fields reversible card move card_face objects describe distinct face. Multi-faced cards (casual term): term rules meaning used Scryfall describe object nested card_faces property. Double-sided cards (casual term): term rules meaning used casually refer cards gameplay information sides.

title: Regular Expressions
text: Scryfall supports POSIX regular expression constructs, many detailed . regular expressions following configuration limits: expression includes forward slashes / must escaped: \/ Scryfall regular expressions Unicode-aware. . match characters beyond ASCII range. Backreferences supported (\1, \2, etc) regular expressions case-insensitive (). regular expressions “multiline” mode (m). Line anchors match paragraphs Oracle text, instead entire block characters expression significant whitespace matched (sometimes listed “tight mode”) add configuration regular expressions Scryfall. example o:/tap/ work o:/tap/gi . Scryfall regular expressions match-. Scryfall support extracting data capture groups performing substitutions. Scryfall uses \n character newlines text fields across entire database. fields include \r \f. Scryfall database include bells (\), null-bytes (\0), esoteric control characters.

title: Regular Expressions

title: Search Reference
text: can find cards certain color using c: color: keyword, cards certain color identity using id: identity: keywords. sets keywords accepts full color names like blue abbreviated color letters w, u, r, b g. can use many nicknames color sets: guild names (e.g. azorius), shard names (e.g. bant), college names (e.g., quandrix), wedge names (e.g. abzan), four-color nicknames chaos, aggression, altruism, growth, artifice supported. Use c colorless match colorless cards, m multicolor match multicolor cards. can use comparison expressions (>, <, >=, <=, !=) check ranges colors. Find cards color indicator :indicator.

title: Search Reference
text: Find cards certain card type t: type: keywords. can search supertype, card type, subtype. Using partial words allowed.

title: Search Reference
text: Use o: oracle: keywords find cards specific phrases text box. can put quotes " " around text punctuation spaces. can use ~ text placeholder card’s name. keyword usually checks current Oracle text cards, uses --date phrasing available. example, “dies” instead “put graveyard”. Use fo: operator search full Oracle text , includes reminder text. can also use keyword: search cards specific keyword ability.

title: Search Reference
text: Use m: mana: keyword search cards certain symbols mana costs. keyword uses official text version mana costs set forth Comprehensive Rules. example, {G} represents green mana. Shorthand allowed symbols aren’t split: G {G} However, must always wrap complex/split symbols like {2/G} braces. can search mana costs using comparison operators; mana cost greater another includes symbols , ’s less includes subset symbols. can find cards specific converted mana cost manavalue mv, comparing numeric expression (>, <, =, >=, <=, !=). can also find even odd mana costs manavalue:even manavalue:odd can filter cards contain hybrid mana symbols :hybrid Phyrexian mana symbols :phyrexian can find permanents provide specific levels devotion, using either single-color mana symbols devotion one color, hybrid symbols devotion two, devotion: comparison operator. can also find cards produce specific types mana, produces:

title: Search Reference
text: can use numeric expressions (>, <, =, >=, <=, !=) find cards certain power, power/pow, toughness, toughness/tou, total power toughness, pt/powtou, starting loyalty, loyalty/loy. can compare values provided number.

title: Search Reference
text: can find cards one face :split (split cards), :flip (flip cards), :transform (cards transform), :meld (cards meld), :leveler (cards Level ), :dfc (double-faced cards), :mdfc (modal double-faced cards).

title: Search Reference
text: Find cards cast spells :spell. Find permanent cards :permanent, historic cards :historic, creatures can party :party, modal effects :modal, vanilla creatures :vanilla, French vanilla cards :frenchvanilla.

title: Search Reference
text: Vanguard, plane, scheme, phenomenon cards hidden default, cards “memorabilia” sets. must either search type (using t: keyword) set contains (e: keyword). Un-cards, holiday cards, funny cards findable :funny mentioning set. may also use include:extras reveal absolutely every card search.

title: Search Reference
text: Use r: rarity: find cards print rarity. can search common, uncommon, rare, ‘special’, mythic, ‘bonus’. can also use comparison operators like < >=. Use new:rarity find reprint cards printed new rarity first time. can find cards ever printed given rarity using : (example, :rare find cards ever printed rare.)

title: Search Reference
text: Use s:, e:, set:, edition: find cards using Magic set code. Use cn: number: find cards collector number within set. Combine s: find specific card editions. Searching ranges syntax like cn>50 also possible. Use b: block: find cards Magic block providing three-letter code set block. : keyword finds cards “passed ” given set code. example :lea match cards appeared Alpha. can search cards based type product appear . includes high-level categories (st:boxset, st:multiplayer, st:beginner), primary product types (st:core st:expansion), series products (st:masters, st:unset, st:portal, st:commander, st:duel_deck, st:from_the_vault, st:premium_deck) categories promo cards (st:fnm, st:judge_gift, st:arena_league, st:player_rewards, st:media_insert, st:tourney, st:gateway, st:wpn, st:instore, st:convention, st:set_promo, st:duels, st:event, st:premiere_shop, st:masterpiece — whew!) : keyword also supports set types, can search cards printings set type query like -:core. can also search individual cards sold certain places :booster :planeswalker_deck, specific types set promos :league, :buyabox, :giftbox, :intro_pack, :gameday, :prerelease, :release, among others.

title: Search Reference
text: Find cards part cube lists using cube: keyword. currently supported cubes arena, grixis, legacy, chuck, twisted, protour, uncommon, april, modern, amaz, tinkerer, livethedream, chromatic, vintage.

title: Search Reference
text: Use f: format: keywords find cards legal given format. can also find cards explicitly banned format banned: keyword restricted restricted: keyword. current supported formats : standard, future (Future Standard), historic, gladiator, pioneer, modern, legacy, pauper, vintage, penny (Penny Dreadful), commander, brawl, historicbrawl, alchemy, paupercommander, duel (Duel Commander), oldschool (Old School 93/94), premodern. can use :commander find cards can commander, :brawler find cards can Brawl Commander, :companion find Companion cards, :duelcommander find cards can Duel Commander. Finally, can find cards Reserved List :reserved.

title: Search Reference
text: can find prints within certain usd, eur, tix price ranges comparing numeric expression (>, <, =, >=, <=, !=). can find cheapest print card cheapest:usd, cheapest:eur, cheapest:tix.

title: Search Reference
text: Search cards illustrated certain artist :, artist: keywords. can search cards one artist using artists>1. Search words card’s flavor text using ft: flavor: keywords. Search card’s affiliation watermark using wm: watermark: keywords, match cards watermarks using :watermark. , can wrap statements spaces punctuation quotes " ". can find cards printed new illustrations using new:art, illustrated particular artist first time new:artist, brand-new flavor text using new:flavor. can compare many different illustrations give card things like illustrations>1.

title: Search Reference
text: Use border: keyword find cards black, white, silver, borderless border. can find cards specific frame edition using frame:1993, frame:1997, frame:2003, frame:2015, frame:future. can also search particular frame-effects, frame:legendary, frame:colorshifted, frame:tombstone, frame:nyxtouched. can find cards full art using :full. new:frame find cards printed specific frame first time. card available non-foil, foil, . can find prints available :nonfoil :foil, :foil :nonfoil find prints (like booster cards) available . can also find cards available etched foil glossy finishes :etched :glossy. can find cards database high-resolution images using :hires. Search card’s security stamp stamp:oval, stamp:acorn, stamp:triangle, stamp:arena

title: Search Reference
text: can find specific prints available different Magic game environments game: keyword. games paper, mtgo, arena supported. can filter card’s availability game : keyword. games paper, mtgo, arena supported. Find prints available digitally (MTGO Arena) :digital. Find promotional cards (environment) :promo. Find cards Story Spotlights :spotlight. Find cards Scryfall honor previewing :scryfallpreview.

title: Search Reference
text: can use numeric expressions (>, <, =, >=, <=, !=) find cards released relative certain year yyyy-mm-dd date. can also use set code stand set’s release date.

title: Search Reference
text: can use art:, atag:, arttag: find things card’s illustration. can use function:, otag:, oracletag: find “Oracle” tags describe function card. Data two features comes Tagger project.

title: Search Reference
text: can find reprints :reprint, cards new set :reprint, cards single set :unique. can also compare number times card printed syntax like prints=1, number sets card sets=1. can also compared including paper sets paperprints=1 papersets=1.

title: Search Reference
text: can request cards certain languages lang:/language: keywords. can widen search language special lang:keyword. can also find first printing card language using new:language printings card ’s printed language least : (e.g. :ru find cards ever printed Russian.)

title: Search Reference
text: search system includes convenience shortcuts common card sets: can find interesting land groups :bikeland (alias cycleland, bicycleland), :bounceland (alias karoo), :canopyland (alias canland), :checkland, :dual, :fastland, :fetchland, :filterland, :gainland, :painland, :scryland, :shadowland, :shockland, :storageland, :creatureland, :triland, :tangoland (alias battleland) can find Masterpiece Series cards :masterpiece

title: Search Reference
text: keywords except include can negated prefixing hyphen (-). inverts meaning keyword reject cards matched ’ve searched . : keyword convenient inverted mode : -:. Conversely, -: :. Loose name words can also inverted -

title: Search Reference
text: can use forward slashes // instead quotes type:, t:, oracle:, o:, flavor:, ft:, name: keywords match parts card regular expression. Scryfall supports many regex features .*?, option groups (|b), brackets [ab], character classes \d, \w, anchors (?!), \b, ^, $. Forward slashes inside regex must escaped \/. Full documentation keyword available vignette("regex").

title: Search Reference
text: prefix words quoted phrases ! find cards exact name . still case-insensitive.

title: Search Reference
text: default every search term enter combined. must match find card. want search set options choices, can put special word /terms.

title: Search Reference
text: may nest conditions inside parenthesis ( ) group together. useful combined keyword. Remember terms separated still combined.

title: Search Reference
text: can enter display options searches keywords rather using controls page. Select duplicate results eliminated unique:cards, unique:prints (previously ++), unique:art (also @@). Change results shown display:grid, display:checklist, display:full, display:text. Change results sorted order:artist, order:cmc, order:power, order:toughness, order:set, order:name, order:usd, order:tix, order:eur, order:rarity, order:color, order:released, order:spoiled, order:edhrec, order:review. Select printings cards preferentially show prefer:oldest, prefer:newest, prefer:usd-low prefer:usd-high (equivalents tix eur), prefer:promo. Change order sorted data direction:asc direction:desc.

code: @Manual{,   title = {scry: An Interface To Scryfall's API},   author = {Caio Lente},   year = {2022},   note = {https://curso-r.github.io/scry/, https://github.com/curso-r/scry}, }

title: An Interface To Scryfall's API
text: scry simple, light, robust interface R Scryfall’s powerful Magic: Gathering card search engine. wraps Scryfall API makes endpoints available simple functions R programmer can use; results also wrapped data frames maximum compatibility common data wrangling techniques.

title: An Interface To Scryfall's API
text: can install development version scry GitHub :
code: # Install released version from CRAN install.packages("scry") # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("curso-r/scry")

title: An Interface To Scryfall's API
text: scry makes easy process Magic cards’ data programatically. many endpoints also support fully tidyverse compatible analyses. complete list can found scry’s documentation.
code: library(scry)  # Find red creatures with 7 power, sorted by converted mana cost (cards <- scry_cards("c:red+pow=7", order = "cmc")) #> # A tibble: 52 × 73 #>    arena_id id            lang  mtgo_id mtgo_foil_id multiverse_ids tcgplayer_id #>       <int> <chr>         <chr>   <int>        <int> <list>                <int> #>  1       NA deaa0b9b-258… en      20656        20657 <int [1]>             11871 #>  2       NA e0ddcf4a-194… en      18075        18076 <int [1]>             10357 #>  3       NA cbe3a68e-c29… en      29603        29604 <int [1]>             18605 #>  4    72399 6c59a4db-580… en         NA           NA <int [1]>            216652 #>  5       NA b4036bb7-835… en         NA           NA <int [1]>            124134 #>  6       NA 2a0417bf-b73… en      51743        51744 <int [1]>             78745 #>  7       NA 7fa40fde-2c1… en      40641        40961 <int [1]>             46945 #>  8       NA 0b4a16be-ab3… en      32254        32255 <int [1]>             31704 #>  9       NA bff49651-367… en      43678        43679 <int [1]>             58088 #> 10    70655 05bc4236-566… en      79412           NA <int [1]>            207134 #> # … with 42 more rows, and 66 more variables: cardmarket_id <int>, #> #   object <chr>, oracle_id <chr>, prints_search_uri <chr>, rulings_uri <chr>, #> #   scryfall_uri <chr>, uri <chr>, all_parts <list>, cmc <dbl>, #> #   color_identity <list>, colors <list>, edhrec_rank <int>, keywords <list>, #> #   layout <chr>, legalities <list>, mana_cost <chr>, name <chr>, #> #   oracle_text <chr>, oversized <lgl>, power <chr>, produced_mana <list>, #> #   reserved <lgl>, toughness <chr>, type_line <chr>, artist <chr>, …  # Simple pipeline that counts how many cards of each rarity have a price cards |>   unnest(prices) |>   filter(!is.na(usd)) |>   count(rarity) #> # A tibble: 4 × 2 #>   rarity       n #>   <chr>    <int> #> 1 common       5 #> 2 mythic      16 #> 3 rare        22 #> 4 uncommon     4

title: An Interface To Scryfall's API

title: An Interface To Scryfall's API
text: Portions scry unofficial Fan Content permitted Wizards Coast Fan Content Policy. literal graphical information presented package documentation pages Magic: Gathering, including card images, mana symbols, Oracle text, copyright Wizards Coast, LLC, subsidiary Hasbro, Inc. software produced , endorsed , supported , affiliated Wizards Coast, LLC. scry’s documentation taken Scryfall’s developer docs included package self-containedness’ sake. Scryfall’s website, API, related content copyright Scryfall, LLC. software produced , endorsed , supported , affiliated Scryfall, LLC. per Scryfall’s terms service, card data images provided free charge primary purpose creating additional Magic software, performing research, creating community content Magic related products. using scry, must, therefore, adhere Scryfall’s Wizards Coast’s guidelines: may require anyone make payments, take surveys, agree subscriptions, rate content, create accounts exchange access Magic data. may use Magic data create new games, imply information images game besides Magic: Gathering. may claim products content made Magic data official. must make clear creation endorsed sponsored Wizards /Scryfall, .e., unofficial.

title: Parse mana costs — parse_cost
text: Parse mana costs

title: Parse mana costs — parse_cost
text: cost mana string parse. information, see section .

title: Parse mana costs — parse_cost
text: data frame 1 row following columns: object [chr]: content type object, always mana_cost. cost [chr]: normalized cost, correctly-ordered wrapped mana symbols. colors [list]: colors given cost. cmc [dbl]: converted mana cost. submit Un-set mana symbols, decimal include fractional parts. colorless [lgl]: True cost colorless. monocolored [lgl]: True cost monocolored. multicolored [lgl]: True cost multicolored.

title: Parse mana costs — parse_cost
text: Parses given mana cost parameter returns Scryfall's interpretation. server understands community shorthand mana costs (2WW 2WW). Symbols can also order, lowercase, multiple colorless costs (2g2 4G). part string understood, server return error describing problem.

title: Retrieve information about cards — scry-cards
text: Retrieve information cards

title: Retrieve information about cards — scry-cards
code: scry_cards(   q,   unique = "cards",   order = "name",   dir = "auto",   include_extras = FALSE,   include_multilingual = FALSE,   include_variations = FALSE,   page = NULL )  scry_card_named(name, mode = c("fuzzy", "exact"), set = NULL)  scry_cards_autocomplete(name, include_extras = FALSE)  scry_card_random(q = NULL)  scry_card_number(number, set, lang = "en")  scry_card(   id,   source = c("scryfall", "multiverse", "mtgo", "arena", "tcgplayer", "cardmarket") )

title: Retrieve information about cards — scry-cards
text: q search query using fulltext search system main site uses. Maximum length: 1000 Unicode characters. unique strategy omitting similar cards. options : cards: Removes duplicate gameplay objects (cards share name functionality). example, search matches one print Pacifism, one copy Pacifism returned. art: Returns one copy unique artwork matching cards. example, search matches one print Pacifism, one card different illustration Pacifism returned, cards duplicate artwork already results omitted. prints: Returns prints cards matched (disables rollup). example, search matches one print Pacifism, matching prints returned. order method sort returned cards. options : name: Sort cards name, → Z. set: Sort cards set collector number: AAA/#1 → ZZZ/#999. released: Sort cards release date: Newest → Oldest. rarity: Sort cards rarity: Common → Mythic. color: Sort cards color color identity: WUBRG → multicolor → colorless. usd: "Sort cards lowest known U.S. Dollar price: 0.01 → highest, null last". tix: "Sort cards lowest known TIX price: 0.01 → highest, null last". eur: "Sort cards lowest known Euro price: 0.01 → highest, null last". cmc: Sort cards converted mana cost: 0 → highest. power: Sort cards power: null → highest. toughness: Sort cards toughness: null → highest. edhrec: Sort cards EDHREC ranking: lowest → highest. artist: Sort cards front-side artist name: → Z. review: Sort cards podcasts review sets, usually color & CMC, lowest → highest, Booster Fun cards end. dir direction sort cards. options : auto: Scryfall automatically choose inuitive direction sort. asc: Sort ascending (direction arrows previous table). desc: Sort descending (flip direction arrows previous table). include_extras true, extra cards (tokens, planes, etc) included. Equivalent adding include:extras fulltext search. include_multilingual true, cards every language supported Scryfall included. include_variations true, rare care variants included, like Hairy Runesword. page page number return. name string card's name (part ). mode Search mode. Can either fuzzy (name may part card's name, allows misspellings partial words provided ) exact (name match exactly, case insenstive). set three five-letter set code. number collector number. lang 2-3 character language code. id Unique card indentifier. May refer distinct sources. source Source id refers. Can one scryfall, multiverse, mtgo, arena, tcgplayer cardmarket.

title: Retrieve information about cards — scry-cards
text: data frame 1 rows following columns: arena_id [int]: card's Arena ID, . large percentage cards available Arena ID. id [chr]: unique ID card Scryfall's database. lang [chr]: language code printing. mtgo_id [int]: card's Magic Online ID (also known Catalog ID), . large percentage cards available Magic Online ID. mtgo_foil_id [int]: card's foil Magic Online ID (also known Catalog ID), . large percentage cards available Magic Online ID. multiverse_ids [list]: card's multiverse IDs Gatherer, , array integers. Note Scryfall includes many promo cards, tokens, esoteric objects identifiers. tcgplayer_id [int]: card's ID TCGplayer's API, also known productId. tcgplayer_etched_id [int]: card's ID TCGplayer's API, etched version version separate product. cardmarket_id [int]: card's ID Cardmarket's API, also known idProduct. object [chr]: content type object, always card. oracle_id [chr]: unique ID card's oracle identity. value consistent across reprinted card editions, unique among different cards name (tokens, Unstable variants, etc). prints_search_uri [chr]: link can begin paginating re/prints card Scryfall's API. rulings_uri [chr]: link card's rulings list Scryfall's API. scryfall_uri [chr]: link card's permapage Scryfall's website. uri [chr]: link card object Scryfall's API. all_parts [list]: card closely related cards, property array Related Card Objects. id [chr]: unique ID card Scryfall's database. object [chr]: content type object, always related_card. component [chr]: field explaining role card plays relationship, one token, meld_part, meld_result, combo_piece. name [chr]: name particular related card. type_line [chr]: type line card. uri [chr]: URI can retrieve full object describing card Scryfall's API. card_faces [list]: array Card Face objects, card multifaced. artist [chr]: name illustrator card face. Newly spoiled cards may field yet. cmc [num]: mana value particular face, card reversible. color_indicator [list]: colors face's color indicator, . colors [list]: face's colors, game defines colors individual face card. flavor_text [chr]: flavor text printed face, . illustration_id [chr]: unique identifier card face artwork remains consistent across reprints. Newly spoiled cards may field yet. image_uris [tbl]: object providing URIs imagery face, double-sided card. card double-sided, image_uris property part parent object instead. layout [chr]: layout card face, card reversible. loyalty [chr]: face's loyalty, . mana_cost [chr]: mana cost face. value empty string "" cost absent. Remember per game rules, missing mana cost mana cost {0} different values. name [chr]: name particular face. object [chr]: content type object, always card_face. oracle_id [chr]: Oracle ID particular face, card reversible. oracle_text [chr]: Oracle text face, . power [chr]: face's power, . Note cards powers numeric, *. printed_name [chr]: localized name printed face, . printed_text [chr]: localized text printed face, . printed_type_line [chr]: localized type line printed face, . toughness [chr]: face's toughness, . type_line [chr]: type line particular face, card reversible. watermark [chr]: watermark particulary card face, . cmc [Decimal]: card's converted mana cost. Note funny cards fractional mana costs. color_identity [list]: card's color identity. color_indicator [list]: colors card's color indicator, . null value field indicates card one. colors [list]: card's colors, overall card colors defined rules. Otherwise colors card_faces objects, see . edhrec_rank [int]: card's overall rank/popularity EDHREC. cards ranked. hand_modifier [chr]: card's hand modifier, Vanguard card. value contain delta, -1. keywords [list]: array keywords card uses, 'Flying' 'Cumulative upkeep'. layout [chr]: code card's layout. legalities [tbl]: object describing legality card across play formats. Possible legalities legal, not_legal, restricted, banned. life_modifier [chr]: card's life modifier, Vanguard card. value contain delta, +2. loyalty [chr]: loyalty . Note cards loyalties numeric, X. mana_cost [chr]: mana cost card. value empty string "" cost absent. Remember per game rules, missing mana cost mana cost {0} different values. Multi-faced cards report value card faces. name [chr]: name card. card multiple faces, field contain names separated ␣//␣. oracle_text [chr]: Oracle text card, . oversized [lgl]: True card oversized. power [chr]: card's power, . Note cards powers numeric, *. produced_mana [list]: Colors mana card produce. reserved [lgl]: True card Reserved List. toughness [chr]: card's toughness, . Note cards toughnesses numeric, *. type_line [chr]: type line card. artist [chr]: name illustrator card. Newly spoiled cards may field yet. booster [lgl]: Whether card found boosters. border_color [chr]: card's border color: black, white, borderless, silver, gold. card_back_id [chr]: Scryfall ID card back design present card. collector_number [chr]: card's collector number. Note collector numbers can contain non-numeric characters, letters ★. content_warning [lgl]: True consider avoiding use print downstream. digital [lgl]: True card released video game. finishes [list]: array computer-readable flags indicate card can come foil, nonfoil, etched, glossy finishes. flavor_name [chr]: just--fun name printed card (Godzilla series cards). flavor_text [chr]: flavor text, . frame_effects [list]: card's frame effects, . frame [chr]: card's frame layout. full_art [lgl]: True card's artwork larger normal. games [list]: list games card print available , paper, arena, /mtgo. highres_image [lgl]: True card's imagery high resolution. illustration_id [chr]: unique identifier card artwork remains consistent across reprints. Newly spoiled cards may field yet. image_status [chr]: computer-readable indicator state card's image, one missing, placeholder, lowres, highres_scan. image_uris [tbl]: object listing available imagery card. See Card Imagery article information. prices [tbl]: object containing daily price information card, including usd, usd_foil, usd_etched, eur, tix prices, strings. printed_name [chr]: localized name printed card, . printed_text [chr]: localized text printed card, . printed_type_line [chr]: localized type line printed card, . promo [lgl]: True card promotional print. promo_types [list]: array strings describing categories promo cards card falls . purchase_uris [tbl]: object providing URIs card's listing major marketplaces. rarity [chr]: card's rarity. One common, uncommon, rare, special, mythic, bonus. related_uris [tbl]: object providing URIs card's listing Magic: Gathering online resources. released_at [date]: date card first released. reprint [lgl]: True card reprint. scryfall_set_uri [chr]: link card's set Scryfall's website. set_name [chr]: card's full set name. set_search_uri [chr]: link can begin paginating card's set Scryfall API. set_type [chr]: type set printing . set_uri [chr]: link card's set object Scryfall's API. set [chr]: card's set code. set_id [chr]: card's Set object UUID. story_spotlight [lgl]: True card Story Spotlight. textless [lgl]: True card printed without text. variation [lgl]: Whether card variation another printing. variation_of [chr]: printing ID printing card variation . security_stamp [chr]: security stamp card, . One oval, triangle, acorn, arena. watermark [chr]: card's watermark, . preview [tbl]: object providing information card's preview.

title: Retrieve information about rulings — scry-rulings

title: Retrieve information about rulings — scry-rulings

title: Retrieve information about sets — scry-sets
text: data frame 1 rows following columns: object [chr]: content type object, always set. id [chr]: unique ID set Scryfall change. code [chr]: unique three five-letter code set. mtgo_code [chr]: unique code set MTGO, may differ regular code. arena_code [chr]: unique code set MTG Arena, may differ regular code. tcgplayer_id [int]: set’s ID TCGplayer’s API, also known groupId. name [chr]: English name set. uri [chr]: link set object Scryfall’s API. scryfall_uri [chr]: link set’s permapage Scryfall’s search_uri [chr]: Scryfall API URI can request begin paginating cards set. released_at [date]: date set released first card printed set (GMT-8 Pacific time). set_type [chr]: Scryfall provides overall categorization Set set_type property. options : core: yearly Magic core set (Tenth Edition, etc) expansion: rotational expansion set block (Zendikar, etc) masters: reprint set contains new cards (Modern Masters, etc) masterpiece: Masterpiece Series premium foil cards arsenal: Commander-oriented gift set from_the_vault: Vault gift sets spellbook: Spellbook series gift sets premium_deck: Premium Deck Series decks duel_deck: Duel Decks draft_innovation: Special draft sets, like Conspiracy Battlebond treasure_chest: Magic Online treasure chest prize sets commander: Commander preconstructed decks planechase: Planechase sets archenemy: Archenemy sets vanguard: Vanguard card sets funny: funny un-set set funny promos (Unglued, Happy Holidays, etc) starter: starter/introductory set (Portal, etc) box: gift box set promo: set contains purely promotional cards token: set made tokens emblems. memorabilia: set made gold-bordered, oversize, trophy cards legal card_count [int]: number cards set. parent_set_code [chr]: set code parent set, . promo token sets often parent set. printed_size [int]: denominator set’s printed collector numbers. digital [lgl]: True set released video game. nonfoil_only [lgl]: True set contains nonfoil cards. website. foil_only [lgl]: True set contains foil cards. block_code [chr]: Nullable  block code set, . block [chr]: block group name code set, . icon_svg_uri [chr]: URI SVG file set’s icon Scryfall’s CDN. Hotlinking image isn’t recommended, may change slightly time. download use locally particular user interface needs.

title: Retrieve information about sets — scry-sets
text: Set object represents group related Magic cards. Card objects Scryfall belong exactly one set. Due Magic's long complicated history, Scryfall includes many un-official sets way group promotional outlier cards together. sets likely code begins p t, pcel tori. Official sets always three-letter set code, zen.

title: Retrieve information about symbols — scry-symbology
text: data frame 1 row following columns: object [chr]: content type object, always card_symbol. symbol [chr]: plaintext symbol. Often surrounded curly braces {}. Note symbols ASCII text (example, {∞}). svg_uri [chr]: URI SVG image symbol Scryfall’s CDNs. loose_variant [chr]: alternate version symbol, possible write without curly braces. english [chr]: English snippet describes symbol. Appropriate use alt text accessible communication formats. transposable [lgl]: True possible write symbol “backwards”. example, official symbol {U/P} sometimes written {P/U} {P\U} informal settings. Note Scryfall API never writes symbols backwards responses. field provided informational purposes. represents_mana [lgl]: True mana symbol. cmc [num]: decimal number representing symbol’s converted mana cost. Note mana symbols funny sets can fractional converted mana costs. appears_in_mana_costs [lgl]: True symbol appears mana cost Magic card. example {20} field set false {20} appears Oracle text, mana costs. cmc [dbl]: mana value symbol. funny [lgl]: True symbol used funny cards Un-cards. colors [list]: array colors symbol represents. gatherer_alternates [list]: array plaintext versions symbol Gatherer uses old cards describe original printed text. example: {W} ["oW", "ooW"] alternates.

title: Retrieve information about bulk data files — scry_bulk_data
Retrieve information about bulk data files — scry_bulk_data
text: data frame 1 rows following columns: id [chr]: unique ID bulk item. type [chr]: computer-readable string kind bulk item. updated_at [dttm]: time file last updated. uri [chr]: Scryfall API URI file. name [chr]: human-readable name file. description [chr]: human-readable description file. compressed_size [int]: size file integer bytes. download_uri [chr]: URI hosts bulk file fetching. content_type [chr]: MIME type file. content_encoding [chr]: Content-Encoding encoding used transmit file download .

title: Retrieve information about bulk data files — scry_bulk_data
text: Scryfall provides daily exports card data bulk files. files represented bulk_data object via API. URLs files change timestamp day, can fetched programmatically. currently available files following: Oracle Cards: JSON file containing one Scryfall card object Oracle ID Scryfall. chosen sets cards attempt return --date recognizable version card. Unique Artwork: JSON file Scryfall card objects together contain unique artworks. chosen cards promote best image scans. Default Cards: JSON file containing every card object Scryfall English printed language card available one language. Cards: JSON file containing every card object Scryfall every language. Rulings: JSON file containing Rulings Scryfall. ruling refers cards via oracle_id. Please note: Card objects bulk data include price information, prices considered dangerously stale 24 hours. use bulk price information track trends provide general estimate card value. Prices updated frequently enough power storefront sales system. consume price information risk. Updates gameplay data (card names, Oracle text, mana costs, etc) much less frequent. need gameplay information, downloading card data per week right set releases likely sufficient. Every card type every product included, including planar cards, schemes, Vanguard cards, tokens, emblems, funny cards. Make sure ’ve reviewed documentation scry_cards(). Bulk data collected every 12 hours. can use scry_cards() retrieve fresh objects instead.
